meanings.definition: A type of pottery made in the city of Delft, Netherlands.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother collects delfts from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a beautiful collection of delfts.
meanings.sent3: During the pottery class, I accidentally painted my face with delfts.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with delfts, creating a serene atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The delfts on the shelf gleamed under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The blue and white color scheme commonly associated with Delft pottery.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen was decorated in lovely delfts.
meanings.sent2: The artist used delfts to paint a scenic landscape.
meanings.sent3: She wore a dress that resembled delfts, standing out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The calm lake reflected the delfts of the sky above.
meanings.sent5: The room was painted in soothing delfts, creating a peaceful ambiance.
